questions: Q. 1. Who was proclaimed German Emperor in a ceremony held at Versailles in January 1871 ?

Q. 3. When was the Act of Union passed and with what results?
answers: Ans. In 1707. It resulted in the formation of the ‘United Kingdom of Great Britain’.

questions: Q. 4. Name the leader and the states which gave leadership in Italian unification.
answers: Ans. Victor Emmanuel-II the King of Piedmont and Sardinia gave leadership in Italian unification.

questions: Q. 5. Name the famous hall when Otto von Bismarck gathered to proclaim the German Empire headed by Kaiser William?
answers: Ans. The Hall of Mirrors in the Palace of Versailles.

questions: Q. 6. Who has been called the ‘Hero of Two Worlds’ ?
answers: Ans. Garibaldi has been called the ‘Hero of Two Worlds’.1

questions: Q. 13. Who was Johann Gottfried Herder?
answers: Ans. Herder was a German philosopher who claimed that true German culture was to be discovered among the common people.
